nio/ListSplit.description: The ListSplit block takes an incoming signal containing a list and splits that list into individual signals per element.

dict_att.title: Attribute Name
dict_att.description: Name of the attribute the list element is assigned to on the outgoing signal.

list_att.title: List
list_att.description: The signal attribute containing the list to be split on the incoming signal.

default.description: Any list of signals containing a list.
A signal per list element on the incoming signal.
